UnitDefinition.Name: Exposure route
UnitDefinition.Description: Accepted routes of exposure to chemicals (i.e., oral, dermal, or inhalation).

Unit.Name: Oral
Unit.Description: Contact to a chemical via ingestion.

Unit.Name: Dermal
Unit.Description: Exposure via contact between a chemical and the skin.

Unit.Name: Inhalation
Unit.Description: Exposure via contact between a chemical and the respiratory system.
